title: Blobs
description: "A timely satire that challenges the status quo through a delicate balance of absurd humor and compassion." --Kirkus Reviews While walking his dog at Airport Park on 3/20/2022, Marty Harperbaron is followed home by a drone-like object floating above his shoulder. Crashing through his front window to be near him, the ‘blob’ won’t stop following him. The Legend of Marty the Kid is born as humanity grapples with a new reality, knocked off the top of the totem pole.Where did the blob come from?What does it want?Will the human race survive the blob’s rules?It’s amazing what we can accomplish when we don’t have a choice.
author: Johnny Moscato
